title: For Sale: Negro/Winter League Baseball Items w/Postcards, Cabinets & Photos (Part I)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: For Sale: Negro/Winter League Baseball Items w/Postcards, Cabinets & Photos (Part I)
posts.post_content:
Since there have not been very many Negro/Winter League Baseball items up for sale/auction over the past year or two, I thought that I would put several of the highlight pieces from my collection up for sale here on Net 54, in case there are any board members interested in purchasing them. Please see below scans along with key details, you can either PM or e-mail me at: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url].

1923-24 Tomas Gutierrez Cuban League Card Album w/Oscar Charleston (HOF), Pop Lloyd (HOF), Cristobal Torriente (HOF), Andy Cooper (HOF) & Jose Mendez (HOF)

Excellent condition $SOLD

Wow Great items good luck with sale some of the most significant items Of baseball History I have seen on net54.
J
